name: recall-kit
description: Experience sharing platform with MCP protocol support

scripts.build: concurrently "npm run build:web" "npm run build:mcp-server" "npm run build:mcp-client"
scripts.test: concurrently "npm run test:web" "npm run test:mcp-server" "npm run test:mcp-client"
scripts.lint: concurrently "npm run lint:web" "npm run lint:mcp-server" "npm run lint:mcp-client"
scripts.setup: npm install && cd web && npm install && cd ../mcp-server && npm install && cd ../mcp-client && npm install
